title: Inspection of premises
context: [ยง340E-4.6] Inspection of premises. The director, in accordance with rules adopted pursuant to chapter 91, may enter and inspect any facility of a supplier of water to determine whether such supplier is acting in compliance with this part. [L 1987, c 165, pt of ยง1] Revision Note &ldquo;Part&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;chapter&rdquo;.
